channel.title: Still confused?!?!?
channel.description: alright so i can get my client up and connect im guessing local host on my desktop. now i have my friend by me and put my clitent on his laptop with a flash drive and when i try to run the client it just flashes alittle and goes away. i put pause at the end to see the error and the error flashes really fast and goes away? another problem is i had him on mopar client and he still couldnt connect so theres something wrong with the client and something wrong with the server im not shure.

item.title: Still confused?!?!?
item.dc:creator: @A_New_LIght A New LIght
item.description:
@A_New_LIght wrote:

replace with this:

@echo off Title Client cd ./Class/ START java -Xmx512m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32 pause

now run it and show error

Read full topic

item.title: Still confused?!?!?

item.description:
@southparkis1 wrote:

A New LIght:

post your run batch file here

@echo off
Title Client
cd ./Class/
START java -Xmx512m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32
exit
